alert.note: Alert for Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 26 at 4:09PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A snow shower will affect Southern Linn county through 445 PM CST... At 407 PM CST, a snow shower was located near Cedar Rapids, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Snow and winds in excess of 30 mph Snow accumulation up to a half inch on grassy surfaces. Roads will see a slushy accumulation. SOURCE...Radar and area web cameras. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Marion, Hiawatha, Robins, Center Point, Fairfax, Ely, Walford, Palo, Alburnett, Shueyville, Bertram, Whittier, Toddville, Squaw Creek Park, Marion Airport, Lafayette, Cedar Rapids Municipal Airport, and Morgan Creek Park. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 12 and 36. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...
